org.grouplens.grapht

Interface Module


  • public interface Module
    Module represents a grouping of related configuration. An entire project could be configured in a single Module, or multiple components can be separated. This also allows you to share example configurations if your application has complex possibilities.
    Author:
    GroupLens Research

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Context ctx)
      Configure bindings given the root Context, ct.

        Parameters:
        ctx - The root context
